channel.title: RemcosRat on Solar Bits

item.title: RemcosRat infection chain from excel with Macros
item.description: What is RemcosRat? RemcosRAT is a Fileless multi-stage malware that is distributed through malicious macros in Excel files. The malware enables remote administration of infected systems to perform unintended actions. This is a simple guide on understanding RemcosRat infection chain. The RemcosRAT infection can be described as shown in the image by @Unit 42. Infection Chain The infection chain start through phishing of the targets through mail services, the final payload of the infection chain is the used for communicating through TCP port 10174 as shown in the image.
